thread.title: The Trophy Homes Linked to Chinese Conglomerate HNA Group

author: Katherine Clarke
title: The Trophy Homes Linked to Chinese Conglomerate HNA Group

organizations.name: trophy homes linked to chinese conglomerate hna group

text:
The financial travails of the giant Chinese conglomerate HNA Group Co., which is currently trying to unload its overseas holdings, are casting a spotlight on a vast portfolio of luxury homes owned by executives of HNA and a U.S. company run by the brother of its chairman.
HNA has racked up significant debt from a long international acquisition spree. While the company has been moving to sell a large chunk of commercial assets, executives at HNA and the U.S. company are sitting on nearly $200 million in luxury homes throughout...
